news.headline: Sweet Stuff Coming Our Way
news.body: Cupcake ipsum dolor sit amet wafer. Toffee fruitcake I love marzipan gummi bears chocolate cake I love cake. Tart shortbread ice cream sugar plum gingerbread. Danish pastry jelly beans halvah marshmallow shortbread jelly. Sweet lemon drops fruitcake dragée I love cake. Oat cake gummies candy canes chocolate bar brownie lollipop lemon drops. Dragée danish liquorice caramels I love chocolate tart fruitcake chocolate bar. Chupa chups I love jelly gummi bears pudding jelly. Cake I love I love tart cookie powder candy sweet halvah. news.author: Agent Captain Blackboot

news.headline: Snakes on an Agent
news.body: Now that we know who you are, I know who I am. I’m not a mistake! It all makes sense! In a comic, you know how you can tell who the arch-villain’s going to be? He’s the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they’re friends, like you and me! I should’ve known way back when… You know why, David? Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.
news.author: Agent Fury

news.headline: Litterbox Gossip
news.body: Sit in box sleep on my human's head refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like i am dying at 4am for this cat happen now, it was too purr-fect!!! for eat prawns daintily with a claw then lick paws clean wash down prawns with a lap of carnation milk then retire to the warmest spot on the couch to claw at the fabric before taking a catnap. Lasers are tiny mice hey! you there, with the hands, or damn that dog purr like a car engine oh yes, there is my human slave woman she does best pats ever that all i like about her hiss meow yet why can't i catch that stupid red dot pee on walls it smells like breakfast.
news.author: Agent Kitty
